T02D3043:85b-0: @85b * // dpal rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3043:85b-1: sems can rnams kyi nad mi bzad pa drag po
T02D3043:85b-2: zhi bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang
T02D3043:85b-3: ldan pas / seng ldeng gi lo ma brdungs te /
T02D3043:85b-4: btsir ba'i khu ba la bzlas pa stong phrag bdun bzlas na /
T02D3043:85b-5: 'brum bu me dbal nag po shin tu mi bzad pa'i nad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3043:85b-6: aa la ka'i lo ma 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i
T02D3043:85b-7: phye mar byas nas snga ma bzhin du bzlas nas
T02D3043:85b-8: / blud na gag lhog dang 'bras mi bzad pa zhi bar nges so //
T02D3043:85b-9: gla rtsi dang btsan dug sngags kyis zin pa la
T02D3043:85b-10: snga ma ltar bzlas nas blud na mdze nad mi
T02D3043:85b-11: bzad pa rnams zhi bar nges so //
T02D3043:85b-15: rma bya'i sgo nga ser po la snga ma ltar bzlas nas blud na /
T02D3043:85b-16: dug nad mi bzad ba las thar bar nges so //
T02D3043:85b-17: dar ya ka dmar po dang /
T02D3043:85b-18: skyer pa'i khanda la snga ma ltar bzlas nas blud
T02D3043:85b-19: na mkhris pa sha ya'i nad mi bzad pa zhi
T02D3043:85b-20: bar 'gyur ro // 'bras bu gsum pa dang pa la sha dang /
T02D3043:85b-21: tsi tra ka'i khu ba la snga ma ltar blud
T02D3043:85b-22: na smyo 'bog gi nad rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro
T02D3043:86a-1: pa dang ga pur gyi chu dang bzang drug gi
T02D3043:86a-2: me tog rnams la snga ma ltar bzlas nas blud
T02D3043:86a-3: na / rims kyi nad mi bzad pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3043:86a-4: mi bzad pa'i nad zhi bar byed pa gser gyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba /
